languages.text: "В качестве усиления и охраны к вам будет приставлен арбитр. Проктор Антар, выйти из строя!" {n}Громогласный окрик прокатывается над строем Арбитес, и Соломон Антар, чеканя шаг, подходит к вашему трону. Его кибермастиф следует за хозяином по пятам.{/n}

"An Arbitrator will be assigned to you for increased security. Proctor Anthar, front and centre!" {n}The Marshal's voice thunders over the Arbitrator ranks, and Solomorne Anthar marches over to your throne, his cyber-mastiff at his heel.{/n}
languages.original_text: "В качестве усиления и охраны к вам будет приставлен арбитр. Проктор Антар, выйти из строя!" {n}Громогласный окрик прокатывается над строем Арбитес, и Соломон Антар, чеканя шаг, подходит к вашему трону. Его кибермастиф следует за хозяином по пятам.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "An Arbitrator will be assigned to you for increased security. Proctor Anthar, front and centre!" {n}The Marshal's voice thunders over the Arbitrator ranks, and Solomorne Anthar marches over to your throne. His cyber-mastiff follows.{/n}

"An Arbitrator will be assigned to you for increased security. Proctor Anthar, front and centre!" {n}The Marshal's voice thunders over the Arbitrator ranks, and Solomorne Anthar marches over to your throne. His cyber-mastiff follows.{/n}

"An Arbitrator will be assigned to you for increased security. Proctor Anthar, front and centre!" {n}The Marshal's voice thunders over the Arbitrator ranks, and Solomorne Anthar marches over to your throne, his cyber-mastiff at his heel.{/n}

"An Arbitrator will be assigned to you for increased security. Proctor Anthar, front and centre!" {n}The Marshal's voice thunders over the Arbitrator ranks, and Solomorne Anthar marches over to your throne, his cyber-mastiff at his heel.{/n}

"An Arbitrator will be assigned to you for increased security. Proctor Anthar, front and centre!" {n}The Marshal's voice thunders over the Arbitrator ranks, and Solomorne Anthar marches over to your throne, his cyber-mastiff at his heel.{/n}

languages.text: « Un arbitrator va être détaché auprès de vous par mesure de précaution supplémentaire. Proctor Anthar, veuillez vous avancer ! » {n}La voix du maréchal roule tel le tonnerre à travers les rangs des arbitrators, et Solomorne Anthar s'approche à grands pas de votre trône, son cyber-mastiff sur les talons.{/n}
languages.original_text: "An Arbitrator will be assigned to you for increased security. Proctor Anthar, front and centre!" {n}The Marshal's voice thunders over the Arbitrator ranks, and Solomorne Anthar marches over to your throne, his cyber-mastiff at his heel.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Un arbitrator va être détaché auprès de vous par mesure de précaution supplémentaire. Proctor Anthar, veuillez vous avancer ! » {n}La voix du maréchal roule tel le tonnerre à travers les rangs des arbitrators, et Solomorne Anthar s'approche à grands pas de votre trône, son cyber-mastiff sur les talons.{/n}

languages.text: «Se le asignará un Arbitrator para incrementar su seguridad. ¡Procurador Anthar, adelante!». {n}La voz del Mariscal resuena entre las filas de los Arbitrator y Solomorne Anthar avanza hacia tu trono seguido de su cibermastín.{/n}
languages.original_text: "An Arbitrator will be assigned to you for increased security. Proctor Anthar, front and centre!" {n}The Marshal's voice thunders over the Arbitrator ranks, and Solomorne Anthar marches over to your throne, his cyber-mastiff at his heel.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Se le asignará un Arbitrator para incrementar su seguridad. ¡Procurador Anthar, adelante!». {n}La voz del Mariscal resuena entre las filas de los Arbitrator y Solomorne Anthar avanza hacia tu trono seguido de su cibermastín.{/n}

languages.text: “法务部会为你指派一名法务官，保障你的个人安全。安萨监察官，出列！”{n}元帅声如洪钟，命令声响彻整支法务官队伍。话音刚落，索罗蒙·安萨便踏着正步走向你的宝座，他的生化獒犬紧随其后。{/n}
languages.original_text: "An Arbitrator will be assigned to you for increased security. Proctor Anthar, front and centre!" {n}The Marshal's voice thunders over the Arbitrator ranks, and Solomorne Anthar marches over to your throne, his cyber-mastiff at his heel.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “法务部会为你指派一名法务官，保障你的个人安全。安萨监察官，出列！”{n}元帅声如洪钟，命令声响彻整支法务官队伍。话音刚落，索罗蒙·安萨便踏着正步走向你的宝座，他的生化獒犬紧随其后。{/n}

languages.text: "Ein Arbitrator wird zur Erhöhung Eurer Sicherheit abgestellt. Proktor Anthar, tretet vor!" {n}Auf den lautstarken Befehl des Marschalls hin marschiert Solomorne Anthar mit seinem Cyber-Mastiff im Schlepptau auf deinen Thron zu.{/n}
languages.original_text: "An Arbitrator will be assigned to you for increased security. Proctor Anthar, front and centre!" {n}The Marshal's voice thunders over the Arbitrator ranks, and Solomorne Anthar marches over to your throne, his cyber-mastiff at his heel.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ein Arbitrator wird zur Erhöhung Eurer Sicherheit abgestellt. Proktor Anthar, tretet vor!" {n}Auf den lautstarken Befehl des Marschalls hin marschiert Solomorne Anthar mit seinem Cyber-Mastiff im Schlepptau auf deinen Thron zu.{/n}

languages.text: 「護衛強化のためにアービトレイターをあなたに割り当てます。代理人アンサール、前へ！」{n}将帥の声はアービトレイターの隊列に雷のごとく響き、ソロモーン・アンサールがサイバーマスチフを後ろに連れてあなたの王座の前に出る。{/n}
languages.original_text: "An Arbitrator will be assigned to you for increased security. Proctor Anthar, front and centre!" {n}The Marshal's voice thunders over the Arbitrator ranks, and Solomorne Anthar marches over to your throne, his cyber-mastiff at his heel.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「護衛強化のためにアービトレイターをあなたに割り当てます。代理人アンサール、前へ！」{n}将帥の声はアービトレイターの隊列に雷のごとく響き、ソロモーン・アンサールがサイバーマスチフを後ろに連れてあなたの王座の前に出る。{/n}

languages.text: "Güvenliğinizin artırılması için size bir Yargıcı atanacak. Üsteğmen Anthar, öne çık!" {n}Miralay'ın sesi, Yargıcı saflarına bir kükreme olarak yansıyor. Solomorne Anthar, ardından gelen siber mastifi ile senin tahtına doğru yürümeye başlıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "An Arbitrator will be assigned to you for increased security. Proctor Anthar, front and centre!" {n}The Marshal's voice thunders over the Arbitrator ranks, and Solomorne Anthar marches over to your throne, his cyber-mastiff at his heel.{/n}
